application-template.name: Metadata Enhancement
application-template.description: This application applies a heuristic to determine attribute kind (scale/nominal/ordinal) when attributeKind is null and generates recode maps for categorical (nominal or ordinal) attributes. Also, if the input data is in delimited format, this app will generate a copy in JSON text records format. The path and name of the copy will be the same as the input data file plus the suffix ".json".
